callAttendent.description: Notifies an attendant that help is needed

returnMainMenu.description: Cancels the current transaction and returns to the main menu

pageCheckoutReceiptHeader.description: The header of the receipt items

pageCheckoutSubtotalTitle.description: The subtotal of all the receipt items

pageCheckoutTaxTitle.description: The total tax of all the receipt items

pageCheckoutTotalTitle.description: The grand total of all the receipt items

lookupItem.description: Prompts the user to look up an item by name/picture

largeItem.description: Calls the cashier to scan a large item

typeInSku.description: Allows the user to type in an SKU instead of scanning
